meanings.definition: The state or quality of being creepy.
meanings.sent1: The creepinesses of the old abandoned house made me shiver.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't shake off the creepinesses of the dark forest.
meanings.sent3: The Halloween decorations added a touch of creepinesses to the party.
meanings.sent4: The fog enveloped the town in a cloak of eerie creepinesses.
meanings.sent5: The movie's soundtrack amplified the creepinesses of the suspenseful scenes.

meanings.definition: The feeling of unease or fear caused by something strange or eerie.
meanings.sent1: A sense of creepinesses washed over me as I entered the dimly lit room.
meanings.sent2: The creepinesses of the unknown sent chills down my spine.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected sound in the quiet room created a moment of creepinesses.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned amusement park had an aura of haunting creepinesses.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silence in the graveyard was filled with unsettling creepinesses.
